channel.title: HitPoint X10 How to back to old style?
channel.description: Hi guys just changed my max hit to the old style(100-->10) but hit point didn't change any idea? [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/zogv34.png[/img]

item.title: HitPoint X10 How to back to old style?
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

A hacky fix would be to just divide it by 10 before rendering it, good luck finding where it’s rendered though (to aid you, you can search for stuff like prayer etc.).

Read full topic
item.source: HitPoint X10 How to back to old style?
